review_text: This course is great. Easy to follow and it covered all points of content. I would have loved to see some of the other areas of the funnel but I loved it.
I must say it was very informative for me.  Thank you!
Nice course with clear steps and language. Only thing I noticed is that the explanation of cross-posting and cross-promoting got mixed up during the quiz.

A lot of great information and tools that are applicable to manage social media.

I love the practical tools recommended, and the marketing theories/concepts discussed. 

My only feedback would be adding more information or example about executing content strategy in multiple channels (how you would organize it/ priority).

Regardless, it was a great course!
Fantastic. Easy to follow, very informative, designed in a way that enabled me to work along with the video and increase what I was able to learn. This was well worth the cost.
Very specific and easy to follow.
I am learning a lot
fun and informative
Excellent course delivered well and very engaging.
Awesome job, great research. Exactly what I needed. Thanks!
Very well structured and easy to follow, you can easily get the basics that you can apply in your day-to-day job!

I loved every second of the Social Media Content Strategy course.  Quick, easy and you can apply the steps right away.  The course is the organic first step to the Facebook/IG Ad Fundamentals courses, I took previously, but it brought all the information into focus.

Thank you,

Uni V. Sol

The quiz was WRONG. It was incorrectly worded. This isn't how I intended for my investment to be used. Please review quiz #19 with Cross Posting and Cross Promoting.



You completed Quiz: Creating an efficient process
Your score
25%

You answered 1 out of 4 questions correctly

1.
If you have a lot of resources, it's recommended that you _____________ your content.
Cross-promoting requires more resources, but it's a better experience for your followers as you're creating content that fits the unique characteristics of each channel.
2.
When you create unique content for each one of your marketing channels you are:
When you create unique content for each one of your marketing channels you are cross-promoting
3.
True of False: It's OK to edit someone elses's image to fit your brand aesthetic.
You should never edit or doctor someone else's content.
4.
When you use the same content on Facebook and Instagram you are:
When you use the same content on Facebook and Instagram you are cross-posting.

RETAKE QUIZ

CONTINUE

A lot of good advice in here, great presentation, and a wonderful tool.

The only thing I disagreed with was in the final video: the invitation to offer this service immediately as a gig. Even the best courses don't matter if it's all book-learning. 

This is (obviously) just a personal opinion, but inviting the students to *try it out on their own social media* so that they can gain some *practice and experience* would have made more sense.

Fiverr is suppose to be a platform for professionals. Handing someone a hammer doesn't mean they can strike the nail.

The instructor was upbeat and well-spoken and I believe the course covered relevant topics toward achieving its end. A couple of things I felt could be improved were when certain highlight points were presented, she moved quickly past them and I often found myself having to stop the video so I could go back over them. Additionally, some of the visual backgrounds were blurred and I was unable to make out many of the words -- e.g. Facebook data. The "CC" was clear throughout the presentation, so that told me that the visuals themselves had the issue. Otherwise, I think the course was a good learning experience and I benefited from it.
